text: 3.19: Stt 6.1–7.24; 8.18; Hi 11.7; 2 Pi 2.5Ana ŋina fara muuŋgiap kav, ana vov, gumgi ntuu bɨnan ki ŋgun vergap Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ bun mbe suaŋgi. 3.19 Bigi kaŋgi gumgi mbari kha ndɨkndɨgi ga mbui. Mba gumgi gu mbigir ntuu, mbe fhum Noa tugen vhɨzgi gumgi gu mbigir ntuu ma. Mbe mbari kha ndɨkndɨga mbui. Ana mba Fhe Bakɨme kaadogi ŋiniŋgi o, Fhe Bakɨme enseri ga nzuai. Mbe Zudaiŋ khueŋ khothɨgi. Mbe gumgi gu mbigir ntuu, mbe Noa tugen vhɨzgim, Fhe Bakɨme mbe ndim phena tɨvaneŋ ga suegi ntɨɨri ma.
